column3: I am involved in defining standards / specifications for SBOMs
column4: I work on International Standards for a SBOM Trust Registry
column5: I develop, compile, and/or apply educational resources related to SBOMs
column6: I use the SBOMs of software projects I am involved in or third-party software components/dependencies
column7: I create tools that generate or process SBOMs
column8: I create SBOMs for the software projects I am involved in
